resources.string:
TS3 Viewer is a simple app for querying TeamSpeak 3 servers. It was made due to the lack of modern and good looking apps with similar functionality.

 If you have any suggestions on improvements or would like to report a bug, please send me an email (can be found on the Google Play page)!
 Thanks to TheHolyWaffle for the TeamSpeak-3-Java-API library (licensed under MIT).

 The source code is available on GitHub.
